price: Bararendegeye rero mu guhakana bivuye inyuma, maze Twebwe Allah Duca Tubarungikira igihuhusi c’igikonyozi, Turabahonya. Mu vy’ukuri mw’ihonywa ryabo, ni ukuri harimwo inkebuzo ku bantu. Ntumwa y’Imana! Hamwe n’ivyo rero, abenshi mu bashikiriwe n’iyo nkuru ntibahavuye bakwemera.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-ahlaknāhum inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
